scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BUILD_MODE=dev APP_URL=https://dev.aii.cx/app REACT_APP_BE_API_URL=https://dev-admin-backend.aii.cx/api/v1 REACT_APP_FORM_SOCKET_URL=wss://dev-chat-backend.aii.cx/chat/v2/lead_form webpack serve --config ./webpack.config.js
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BUILD_MODE=prod APP_URL=https://aii.cx/app REACT_APP_BE_API_URL=https://admin-backend.aii.cx/api/v1 REACT_APP_FORM_SOCKET_URL=wss://chat-backend.aii.cx/chat/v2/lead_form webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BUILD_MODE=dev APP_URL=https://dev.aii.cx/app REACT_APP_BE_API_URL=https://dev-admin-backend.aii.cx/api/v1 REACT_APP_FORM_SOCKET_URL=wss://dev-chat-backend.aii.cx/chat/v2/lead_form webpack --config webpack.config.js
